channel.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
channel.description:
Yes, I made another post before yesterday about this, but the posts werent specific enough and I had NO idea what to do. So yeah, PLEASE be specific. I need to know exactly what to put what to edit and where. Thanks alot =\
Note: I DONT want to make npcs "yell"

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Quote from: Miss_Doctor on Today at 05:22:14 PM I need to know exactly where to put it mmm :d

Oh wow. Another person with a dirty mind! o_O backs away slowly

And…I got errors.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a conversation with an npc?

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

case 1558: if(playerHasItemAmount(itemID, int)==true && q#stage == #){ sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("You MUST stand on the most southern", 4903); sendFrame126("part of the side of the dock to use this", 4904); sendFrame126("secret teleport! Once you have gathered all the", 4905); sendFrame126("tickets, come back to me!", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; } else { sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("UGH! get the stuff i told you to get!, 4903); sendFrame126("You never listen to me!", 4904); sendFrame126("Youll never get this quest done , 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
lol is that what you meant

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a conversation with an npc?

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Where do I add that? In what part of the code? This else if (NPCID == 1552) // Santa Christmas Event { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1552; } Or case 1558: sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("You MUST stand on the most southern", 4903); sendFrame126("part of the side of the dock to use this", 4904); sendFrame126("secret teleport! Once you have gathered all the", 4905); sendFrame126("tickets, come back to me!", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

The 1558 is the the conversation I want it to go to if they have 4 of item id 619 (not noted)

Oh, and also, i’ve tried adding to the first one…but I got errors o_O I’ve seen something that looks like what you gave me formatted in different “things” for quests, but when I add them to mine they dont work o_O

if(q3stage == 1 && !playerHasItemAmount(84, 1))

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a conversation with an npc?

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

use these
if(playerHasItemAmount(itemID, int)==true && q#stage == #){
dialogue stuff here
}
replace all #s and the “int” + “itemID” with what you need

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a conversation with an npc?

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Hm…Okay. Burn, I did that…how do you make it now so that once you press click here to continue it continues the conversation?

Nevermind, figured it out. How do you make it like a quest now? Like if you talk to the npc with an item, it opens a diff dialague?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a conversation with an npc?

item.title: How do you make a conversation with an npc?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

i can help :]
ctrl+f find
case 155:
under it, are stuffs like

} else if (NPCID == 1001) { // Dark Mage skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1001;
and not far under this was

} else if (NPCID == 2262) { // Dark Mage darkmage = true; selectoption("What do you want?", "Can I have my skill capes, please?", "Can I have my skill hoods, please?", ""); PutNPCCoords = true;]

also add it into “case 40:”
hope ive helped, and GL on the selectoption stuff.I dont know that part
EDIT: ohh whoops i gave you a selectoption, look around in the case and find a dialogue one, then use it to make your own(sorry)

Read full topic
